Reader.Name: tab_column3
Reader.Sql: SELECT COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS pcount, COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS fcount, COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS dcount, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-(IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0)))) AS guarantySum, SUM(IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)) AS loadSum, SUM(IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0)) AS FfreeSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.`apply_ID`=pp.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<'"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<'"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID where 1=1 and pp.busiClass='02' AND pa.`guarantyOrgID` = '73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<'"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}
Reader.Description: SELECT COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS pcount, COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS fcount, COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS dcount, SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-(IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0)))) AS guarantySum, SUM(IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)) AS loadSum, SUM(IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0)) AS FfreeSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.`apply_ID`=pp.`apply_ID` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<'"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<'"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID where 1=1 and pp.busiClass='02' AND pa.`guarantyOrgID` = '73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<'"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}

Reader.Name: tab_column5
tab_column3_1
tab_column5_1
tab_column3_2
tab_column5_2
tab_column3_3
Reader.Sql:
SELECT
COUNT(tab.project_ID) AS dcount, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS freeSum
FROM ( (SELECT pfp.project_ID FROM pro_factpay pfp LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pfp.project_ID=pp.project_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND pp.busiClass='02' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y-%m')"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) UNION (SELECT
pre.project_ID
FROM pro_replace pre LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pre.project_ID=pp.project_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND pp.busiClass='02'
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y-%m')"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pre.project_ID
)
) tab
LEFT JOIN pro_factpay pfp ON pfp.project_ID = tab.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_replace pre ON pre.project_ID = tab.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.project_ID = tab.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.`apply_ID`=pp.`apply_ID` where 1=1 AND pa.`guarantyOrgID` = '73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334' ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}
Reader.Description:
SELECT
COUNT(tab.project_ID) AS dcount, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS freeSum
FROM ( (SELECT pfp.project_ID FROM pro_factpay pfp LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pfp.project_ID=pp.project_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND pp.busiClass='02' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y-%m')"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID ) UNION (SELECT
pre.project_ID
FROM pro_replace pre LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pre.project_ID=pp.project_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND pp.busiClass='02'
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y-%m')"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')"} GROUP BY pre.project_ID
)
) tab
LEFT JOIN pro_factpay pfp ON pfp.project_ID = tab.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_replace pre ON pre.project_ID = tab.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.project_ID = tab.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.`apply_ID`=pp.`apply_ID` where 1=1 AND pa.`guarantyOrgID` = '73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334' ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}

Reader.Name: tab_column5_3
Reader.Sql: -- 本期还款本年累计 SELECT ifnull(COUNT(pf.factPay_ID),0) as dcount , sum(IFNULL(pf.payCapitalSum, 0)) as freeSum FROM pro_factpay pf LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.project_ID = pf.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.`apply_ID`=pp.`apply_ID` WHERE pp.busiClass = '02' and pf.payCapitalSum<>0 AND pa.`guarantyOrgID` = '73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pf.payDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pf.payDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')"} GROUP BY pf.project_ID
Reader.Description: -- 本期还款本年累计 SELECT ifnull(COUNT(pf.factPay_ID),0) as dcount , sum(IFNULL(pf.payCapitalSum, 0)) as freeSum FROM pro_factpay pf LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.project_ID = pf.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.`apply_ID`=pp.`apply_ID` WHERE pp.busiClass = '02' and pf.payCapitalSum<>0 AND pa.`guarantyOrgID` = '73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pf.payDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):"AND DATE_FORMAT(pf.payDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')"} GROUP BY pf.project_ID
